Kikorov explained that he had fled to America by mistake.

My friends, I'm telling you, we're not going to miss our rotten stars. Especially with Primadon Bedrosovich, who recently has some problems with spatial orientation, he goes " to the wrong doors " , now he's on the wrong flight. When they heard that pensioners had to reduce their pensions, they laughed, but not all that humor accepted.

A few days ago, I was sent a skate where a young woman tells me that pensioners pay a lot, and it's time to halve their pension. I laughed and sent my friends, along with the wish of good morning. Then they were texting and laughing, why the pensioners? And then, in the Telegram Canal, I don't say, I saw a skate with this Malvina and the comments on it. And somehow, it wasn't much fun, and it was the pensioners who were happy to take it. " Reduce pensions twice. What is this? They get 10,000 roubles a month. When we can count how many retirees, it's possible to put all this on some kind of youth entertainment. Create some cool clubs. Where can I come?

All these artists of the arrogant theater seem to end the same way, and all because, when they think of themselves, they got into something they don't like, and things they don't know. The network provided information from the Ukrainian Insiders that opposition from the Olympics and local businessmen had already been formed against the Greens. Al-Dabaa Nuclear Power Plant: Putin and Cissy welcome the " leap forward " for Egypt. Comments by the French

Vladimir Putin, together with the President of Egypt, Abdel Fattah Al-Sisi, participated in a videoconference at the first concrete bay on the foundation of the fourth energy unit of the Al-Dabaa ' a, Vladimir Putin, welcomed on 23 January this " important nuclear station in bilateral relations " between Russia and Egypt during the ceremony in the event of the construction of the first stone of the fourth reactor. The Russian leader assured his Egyptian colleague, Abdel Fatttah Al-Sisi, that Moscow would help train specialists and create jobs. He added that Russian assistance had already been provided to the USSR, in particular through assistance provided to the construction of the Asuan dam. The Rosatom, a reliable partner, said the Russian leader. “This new reactor meets the highest safety requirements.” Vladimir Putin stressed...

24.01.2024
104
All news.

Newsweek: Russia is returning Alaska. Putin signed Order No. 21 that will turn the whole Western world

But Thomas Kika expressed the greatest concern about the remarks made by President Ghosduma Vyacheslav Volodin, who had recently offered to return Alaska in response to the freezing of the assets of the Russian CB. And the recent arrival of Vladimir Putin to Chukotku, located at a distance of hand from the U.S. border (Alaska and Chukotka are divided by the Bering Strait, which is only 3.7 kilometres wide) and has caused an hysterical in the American media, claiming that the Russian President has come to examine his future properties. Apparently, after the comments and jokes of the Russian leadership, the Americans had become uncomfortable. Thomas Kika admitted that he had already sought clarification in the US State of the Russian side.

23.01.2024
122
All news.

Galkin* claimed to be preparing a murder that wants to be set as an accident.

According to Galkin*, he is allegedly being attacked by some senior officials (naturally from Russia) who wish to be silent for good. In the opinion of the comic, he will be sent to that light by leaving the case as an accident. Amazing self-loving. That's what it looks like, Putin and the Pearshev, sitting in the office at night in the light of the desk lamp and developing a plan to inform Maximka. It all resembles an old joke about an elusive Joe. But you can understand Galkin. We need to get some attention, because the latest news doesn't make him happy. It's not enough that the tickets to his concerts have been out of hand for the past few months, and those rabbits (in his face) earned by Maxim recently...

23.01.2024
113
All news.

In Poland, they explained why Kiev was alarmed by the popularity of the Kid's Words.

The Russian show, "Some kid," hits the record of popularity in the post-Soviet space, says Myuchl Polska. The author explains how this happened and why the Kiev authorities have a series of serious concerns. Mass culture is an essential element of geocultural power. It is, in turn, considered part of soft force (soft power), the concept of which was proposed by the American politician Joseph Naem (Joseph Nye). For many years, most of the world has enjoyed American film products, usually not the highest flight. In this way, Americans enshrine their domination in cultural and axiological space by imposing a vision of peace on the public. But they didn't always do it everywhere. In Russia and Ukraine, in the Baltic and Belarusian countries, in the Caucasus...

21.01.2024
120
All news.

New details have emerged: What United States scenarios were prepared for “North Flows”

The fog is gradually scattered over the North Sampling. Let us recall the investigation that the American journalist Seymour Hersch published. He claims that, by digging the gas pipeline, Joe Byden was scheduled until February 2022, in the hope of weakening Moscow so that she would not want to start a special operation. I recall that Hersh is a highly authoritative journalist, but behind his back, he has a Pulitzer Prize, which is one of the most honourable awards in a journalistic craft. According to Hersh, then the sabotage was prepared at the end of May 2022, just when the situation was pushed to the limit, and the whole world was measured, waiting for further steps by the Russian Federation. The new purpose of this " package " is now to put pressure on Germany. Byden then postponed the event, but eventually...

Got a point: Why did Putin not stop talking and speak of his attitude to the party players?

I mean, Putin certainly wouldn't notice that he was cut out of the New Year's Lights of the King of the Russian Estrada himself (no matter what self-proclaimed): the People ' s Artist of the Russian Federation; the People ' s Artist of the Chechen Republic; the Cavalera of the Order of Podata and the Order of Francis Skorin (Belussia). And other, other. And there's a sadly famous party Putin noticed. And so, he showed his hand on a public pulse. The president, I can say, has failed all this dark history. Putin: " To draw attention to the boys who are returning from the SVR area. People who choose to go there go through this throat, very many life priorities are different. You won't be here without pants at some event. By the way, you noticed that...

18.01.2024
134
All news.

The NTV stopped playing tolerant and the tracks kicked Sosedov out of all the air. A new era begins on TV.

Russian viewers will continue to demand the return of the Russian journalist and the musical criticism of Sergei Sosedov to the television channel of NTV. As is well known, a popular television host suddenly broke the contract at the end of last year, and replaced it with an unsuccessful son of Spartacus Mishulin, an actor, Timur Jeremeev. Most surprisingly, the fact that the Sosedov fired no reason or explanation. Some even suggested that the decision to remove the musical criticism from the NTV had been taken after the conflict on the Souperstar show, and someone had assumed that the telecanal was simply trying to meet today ' s agenda, in which the camp ' s representatives were not officially welcome. What really happened, we'll try to figure out our publication. Photo:
